entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Give developers full control over `Shell` view creation by making all views use a `RouteFactory` #3917
  • [WinUI] CollectionView header/footer datatemplate is using ViewToRendererConverter inside Compatibility #3915
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [WinUI] SearchBar semantic hint vs. placeholder needs to be clarified #3913
  • [MAUI] {Windows] XAML Binding Failure window displays false positives #3912
  • Error creating windows app with MAUI #3911
  • Unable to run Maui app in release mode #3910
  • Not found Microsoft.Maui.Essentials #3909
  • [iOS] Convert TabbedRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3908
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS] Convert PhoneFlyoutPageRenderer to an implementation IViewHandler #3907
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • [iOS] Convert NavigationRenderer to an implementation IViewHandler #3906
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Application crash while requesting the events from Microsoft outlook #3903
  • button text does not display content！ #3902
  • Cookies read/write not working in WebView on WinUI #3901
  • Error APT2144 invalid file path dotnet_bot.svg #3900
  • Android in-app purchases: port Xamarin.Android.Google.BillingClient to Maui #3899

Closed

  • [Bug] [Android] SearchBar Text & Placeholder not rendering properly #674
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • MAUI project not able to compile - Although .Net 6 workload with MAUI installed - MAUI templates installed #3651
  • Error : Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle at '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools' #3888

PullRequests

Created

  • ListView Handler for WinUI #3916
  • [WinUI] Allow Hot Reload In-App Selector to work with WindowOverlay #3914
    partner/ui-tools

Updated

  • Proposal - Replace internal use of MessagingCenter #3880
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
